name: DeepSeek-OCR vLLM Server
description: DeepSeek-OCR frontier OCR model served via vLLM with OpenAI-compatible API. Supports images, PDFs, receipts, invoices, and complex documents. Runs on x86_64 with NVIDIA GPU.
readme:
# DeepSeek-OCR vLLM Server

## Overview
DeepSeek-OCR is a frontier OCR model that provides high-quality text extraction from images, PDFs, receipts, invoices, and complex documents.

## Features
- ✅ OpenAI-compatible API
- ✅ Supports multiple image formats (PNG, JPEG, TIFF, etc.)
- ✅ Optimized for receipts, invoices, forms
- ✅ Multi-language support
- ✅ Table and chart extraction
- ✅ Handwritten text recognition

## API Endpoint
Once deployed, access the API at:
```
http://<pod-id>-8000.proxy.runpod.net/v1
```

## Quick Test
```bash
curl http://<pod-id>-8000.proxy.runpod.net/v1/models
```

## Usage Example
```python
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    api_key="EMPTY",
    base_url="http://<pod-id>-8000.proxy.runpod.net/v1"
)

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-OCR",
    messages=[{
        "role": "user",
        "content": [
            {"type": "image_url", "image_url": {"url": "https://example.com/receipt.png"}},
            {"type": "text", "text": "Free OCR."}
        ]
    }],
    max_tokens=2048,
    temperature=0.0
)

print(response.choices[0].message.content)
```

## GPU Requirements
- Minimum: 24GB VRAM (RTX 3090, RTX 4090, A5000)
- Recommended: 40GB+ VRAM (A100, H100)

## First Run
The model (~20GB) will download on first startup. This takes 5-10 minutes depending on network speed.

## Health Check
```bash
curl http://<pod-id>-8000.proxy.runpod.net/health
```

## Documentation
- API Docs: http://<pod-id>-8000.proxy.runpod.net/docs
- GitHub: https://github.com/deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-OCR
- vLLM Docs: https://docs.vllm.ai/

## Support
For issues or questions, visit the GitHub repository.
